text: Balunah ami tomaderake bali, tadera madhye kara manda pratiphala rayeche allahara kache? Yadera prati allaha abhisampata karechena, yadera prati tini krodhambita hayechena, yadera katakake banara o sukare rupantarita kare diyechena ebam yara sayatanera aradhana kareche, tara'i maryadara dika diye nikrstatara ebam satyapatha theke'o aneka dure.
